channel.title: Webclient help (jarmaker)
channel.description:
okay so i use this tutorial to jar and sign my client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.msg3914106.html#msg3914106 everything works out no errors. if i run it i can connect fine i upload it to dropbox and let a friend download it, it says: could not find the main class: client. Program will now exit. what do i do? i found out the issue is in the Jar Manifest....i type in 'client' in the Main-Class and its the same in my run.bat file for my client so i'm not too sure why it would be saying that.
does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Webclient help (jarmaker)
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

send me your teamviewer info

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help (jarmaker)
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

okay so i use this tutorial to jar and sign my client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.msg3914106.html#msg3914106
everything works out no errors. if i run it i can connect fine
i upload it to dropbox and let a friend download it, it says: could not find the main class: client. Program will now exit.
what do i do?
i found out the issue is in the Jar Manifest…i type in ‘client’ in the Main-Class and its the same in my run.bat file for my client so i’m not too sure why it would be saying that.

does anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
